meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unthinkable.
meanings.sent1: The unthinkabilities of outer space boggle my mind.
meanings.sent2: Scientists often ponder the unthinkabilities of time travel.
meanings.sent3: Trying to imagine a world without colors is like diving into unthinkabilities.
meanings.sent4: Her unthinkabilities were like a maze with no exit.
meanings.sent5: The unthinkabilities of infinity stretched beyond comprehension.

meanings.definition: Things that are impossible to think about.
meanings.sent1: The book delves into the unthinkabilities of parallel universes.
meanings.sent2: Philosophers enjoy discussing the unthinkabilities of existence.
meanings.sent3: His unthinkabilities were so absurd, they made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unthinkabilities of the future loomed like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: She was lost in the unthinkabilities of the unknown.
